jobDescription: Well known, established Plaintiff's Personal Injury Firm located on the border of Queens and Nassau County, Long Island.  Seeking full-time responsible, detail-oriented paralegal/legal secretary with PLAINTIFF'S PERSONAL INJURY experience.  Excellent opportunity for candidate who is able to multi-task while working in a high volume, fast-paced environment. Do you have the following PLAINTIFF's PERSONAL INJURY experience?Drafting Summons & ComplaintsBills of ParticularsDiscovery ResponsesP.C. Request/Note of IssueCorrespondence wit Hospitals and Medical OfficesMedical UpdatesNew Client IntakeExtensive Client Contact If you have the above PLAINTIFF'S PERSONAL INJURY experience, please email your resume ( in confidence) with realistic salary requirements to LegalResumeAndApplication@Gmail.Com.
